titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Caroline Tunstel
CWG13659

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Caroline Tunstel, Dr.

row.cell: For Washing for the State Military Hospital Stationed at Frankfort Ky.
For the month ending the Seventeenth of February 1864 $12.00

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

Wm H. Gardner
Surgeon in Charge Quarter-Master.

Received at Frankfort Ky, the 11 of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, Fourteen Dollars and fifty cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
No Abstract.
Caroline Tunstell
Dollars 22.50/100
Paid 11" March 1864.
Hospital
